description: It`s time for the Culture Festival in Love`s school. Love and Daisuke has a fight during school. When Love gets trapped inside the school with Daisuke, they have to work together to escape the Nakewameke.

titles.title: Culture Festival of Terror! Echoing Footsteps on School at Night!!
Kyoufu no Bunkasai! Yoru no Gakkou ni Hibiku Ashioto!!
恐怖の文化祭! 夜の学校に響く足音!!
